name: YO! And Friends
description:
Yo! is back and this time she brought friends!

Time your jumps to stack up a tower of blocks, take on daily challenges, open gifts, play the pachinko machine to get new playable friends, and don't forget to put on a fancy hat!

Yo! And Friends will keep you entertained with...

- challenging one tap gameplay!
- 50 cute characters!
- hats! unlocking the same character twice (or more...) will level their style right up!
- daily challenges that come with exclusive rewards!
